item.description:
Let's meet before the comedy show for dinner. Your welcome to join us for dinner even if your not going to the comedy show.

If you would like to go to the comedy show and be seated with our group, please see the Dante's comedy night meet-up.

The reservation will be under Ivone or TFS. Please ask the hostess for help locating our group.

Hope to see you all there.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be holding a TFS sign
item.name: Dinner @ Firefly's
